com.technototes.subsystem

Interface HolonomicDrivebaseSubsystem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DrivebaseSubsystem, SpeedSubsystem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EncodedMecanumDrivebaseSubsystem, EncodedSwerveDrivebaseSubsystem, MecanumDrivebaseSubsystem, SwerveDrivebaseSubsystem

    public interface HolonomicDrivebaseSubsystem
extends DrivebaseSubsystem
    An interface to extend holonomic drivebases from
    Author:
    Alex Stedman

    • Method Detail

      • joystickDrive

        default void joystickDrive(double x,
                           double y,
                           double rotation)
        Basic joystick drive function
        Parameters:
        x - Left/Right Motion (pass joystick left stick x usually)
        y - Up/Down Motion (pass joystick left stick y usually)
        rotation - Rotational Motion (pass joystick right stick x usually)

      • joystickDriveWithGyro

        default void joystickDriveWithGyro(double x,
                                   double y,
                                   double rotation,
                                   double gyroAngle)
        Basic joystick drive function with gyro
        Parameters:
        x - Left/Right Motion (pass joystick left stick x usually)
        y - Up/Down Motion (pass joystick left stick y usually)
        rotation - Rotational Motion (pass joystick right stick x usually)
        gyroAngle - The gyro value (degrees) (0 is initial robot orientation)

      • drive

        default void drive(double speed,
                   double angle,
                   double rotation)
        Basic drive function
        Parameters:
        speed - Speed to drive at
        angle - Angle to drive at
        rotation - Amount to rotate/turn

      • drive

        void drive(double flSpeed,
           double frSpeed,
           double rlSpeed,
           double rrSpeed)
        Function to set motor powers for driving (do scale calculations here)
        Parameters:
        flSpeed - Speed to set front left motor to
        frSpeed - Speed to set front right motor to
        rlSpeed - Speed to set rear left motor to
        rrSpeed - Speed to set rear right motor to

      • stop

        default void stop()
        Stop Drivebase
        Specified by:
        stop in interface SpeedSubsystem
